attributes.action: To slow down the race for AI integration and to re-look at laws around AI
attributes.additional_details: To re-visit laws around this since, you can do this in Grock and Chatgpt. I'm also sick of businesses going we need to apply AI too everything when there is nothing regulating AI fully. This is dangerous and disgusting that AI companies are allowing this to continue without any repercussions. I get that the humans involved in this need to have repercussions and they should be. But the companies are the ones allowing this when there is ways to code this out of AI or put security measures in.
attributes.background: At the moment platform X is allowing Grock to transform normal pictures of women and children into revenge porn, them in abuse, them unclothed and so on. It's disgusting

rejection.details:
